segments.text: I notice the way the woman is polishing that plate, almost obsessively.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron are so neat, yet the kitchen is turning into a disaster zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn’t she feel the cold water creeping around her foot?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's startling to realize how easily accidents can happen in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s small frame barely clings to the wobbly stool, and it makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see him straining, his fingers inching closer to the cookies, driven by some sweet impulse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s eagerness adds to the tension; she looks ready to burst with excitement!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can’t the woman just turn around for a moment to see what's happening?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s as if they’re all in their own little bubbles, unaware of the impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I have to wonder what would happen if she finally noticed their antics.
segments.speaker: PAR
